section.title: RestClient
section.programlisting:
RestClient defaultClient = RestClient.create();
RestClient customClient = RestClient.builder() .requestFactory(new HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory()) .messageConverters(converters -> converters.add(new MyCustomMessageConverter())) .baseUrl("https://example.com") .defaultUriVariables(Map.of("variable", "foo")) .defaultHeader("My-Header", "Foo") .requestInterceptor(myCustomInterceptor) .requestInitializer(myCustomInitializer) .build();
